products.title: Bosworth Acacia Roman Blind
products.description: Bosworth is a patterned fabric which comes in 4 very beautiful soft colours. The modern geometric pattern of thiscream roller blind will add a stylish touch to any room in your home. Product id: db-rom0616 fabric colour: acacia material: 100% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets. Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes bosworth acacia roman blind in grey/green/multicoloured.

products.title: Acacia Dove Grey Roman Blind
products.description: Bring the outdoors in with the acacia dove grey roman blind in a smart grey. Custom made from textured fabric highlighted with sprinkles of metallic, weve hand picked this collection to boost not only warmth in your room, but also to add a style youll be appreciative of in years to come. Product id: db-rom1089 fabric colour: dove grey material: 56% polyester 44% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Acacia Brown Roman Blind
products.description: Furnish your home with refinement by selecting the acacia brown roman blind in an elegant fabric accented with hints of metallic. Hand selected in a textile that not only breathes well due to its cotton blend, it also cascades over your window with minimal creasing. Dont say we dont think of everything. You wont be disappointed in your choice. Product id: db-rom1090 fabric colour: brown material: 56% polyester 44% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Acacia, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: For a distinct dcor scheme with lavish fabric and dazzling colour, include the splendid acacia in natural, with its plush embellishment and quilted texture, and where a charming foliage display is formed from opulent gold and emerald threads. The sophisticated cream background provides refined style and elegance. Combine the natural with an assortment of layered fabrics and luxuriously embellished details for a welcoming and affluent look.
